remarks: Move universal quantifier in and out of class substitution, with an explicit non-free variable condition and in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 30-May-2019.)
statement:
sbcalfi.1 $e |- F/_ y A $.
sbcalfi.2 $e |- ( [. A / x ]. ph <-> ps ) $.
sbcalfi $p |- ( [. A / x ]. A. y ph <-> A. y ps ) $.
$d x y $.
